judul: Python Data Analysis: Time Series Analysis with Pandas
konten: Time series analysis involves analyzing data points collected over a period of time. Pandas...

contoh.isi:
import pandas as pd

# Example of time series analysis using Pandas
url = 'https://example.com/time_series_data.csv'
df = pd.read_csv(url, parse_dates=['date_column'])

# Set date column as index
df.set_index('date_column', inplace=True)

# Perform time series analysis
mean_value = df['value_column'].resample('M').mean()
print('Mean value per month:\n', mean_value)
contoh.komentar: Performs time series analysis using Pandas.

topik.topik: Analisis Deret Waktu dengan Pandas dalam Python
topik.deskripsi: Menggunakan Pandas untuk menganalisis data berdasarkan waktu dalam deret waktu (time series) dalam Python.

highlight: analyzing data points collected over a period of time

error.deskripsi: KeyError occurred due to missing key in Pandas DataFrame.
error.solusi: Ensure correct key is used when setting index in Pandas DataFrame.

judul: Python Functional Programming: Lambda Functions and Map-Reduce
konten: Lambda functions and map-reduce are key concepts in functional programming. They allow you to write...

contoh.isi:
# Example of lambda functions and map-reduce in Python
numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

# Example of using lambda function with map
squared = list(map(lambda x: x**2, numbers))
print('Squared numbers:', squared)

# Example of using reduce to compute the sum
from functools import reduce
sum = reduce(lambda x, y: x + y, numbers)
print('Sum of numbers:', sum)
contoh.komentar: Illustrates lambda functions and map-reduce in Python.

topik.topik: Fungsi Lambda dan Map-Reduce dalam Functional Programming Python
topik.deskripsi: Menggunakan fungsi lambda dan map-reduce untuk memanipulasi data dalam pemrograman fungsional Python.

error.deskripsi: TypeError occurred due to incorrect data type used with lambda function.
error.solusi: Ensure correct data types are used with lambda functions and map in Python.
